  • Method Details

    • addElement

      public void addElement​(T obj)
      Adds the specified element to the heap in the appropriate position according to its key value. Note that equal elements are added to the right.
      Specified by:
      addElement in interface HeapADT<T>

    • removeMin

      public T removeMin() throws EmptyCollectionException
      Remove the element with the lowest value in the heap and returns a reference to it. Throws an EmptyCollectionException if the heap is empty.
      Specified by:
      removeMin in interface HeapADT<T>
      Throws:
      EmptyCollectionException

    • findMin

      public T findMin() throws EmptyCollectionException
      Returns the element with the lowest value in the heap. Throws an EmptyCollectionException if the heap is empty.
